ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: ID column is unknown
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In most of my tables the PK columns aren't visible and therefore I can't execute queries like *SELECT * FROM SomeTable Where SomeEntry_ID* Interestingly, the ID columns seem to be unknown. This is the error message I get via Swagger: `Undefined binding(s) detected when compiling FIRST. Undefined column(s): [SomeEntry_ID] query: select top(?)....`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: inject workspace specific environment variables from env file cloud: fix permissions for configure.sh and include curl,jq set default config dir
